name: Helicopter Seed 64
description:
Spin And Twirl and Grow A Forest! Deliver your whirling twirling helicopter seed to the rich soil below, in order to grow new trees! Collect Growth Coins on your way to expand the trees you already have. Let us know in the comments what your high scores (in the various stats on the stats screen) were! The game ends when its too laggy to continue! Have fun!

Controls KeyboardControllermovementWASDLeft Stick
CameraArrow Keys
Right STick
Stop Spinning And Plummet
Space Bar
B Button
Reset Scene
RQuit/Back To Title
EscapeStartInvert Camera
CtrlRight Bumper
Toggle Music
M

This game was made by JohnLee Cooper & Silver Lewis for Global Game Jam 2023, whose theme was "roots"! The entire source file is up on the ggj page if anyone feels like playing around with the tree generation or character controller. Enjoy!

Secret Controls Iterate Trees
I
